meanings.definition: An inscription on or above something.
meanings.sent1: The superscription on the ancient artifact provided valuable information.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the superscription on the signpost as we passed by.
meanings.sent3: The superscription on the birthday cake read 'Happy Birthday, Sarah!'
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a superscription on the canvas of life, brightening every moment.
meanings.sent5: The superscription on the map guided us through the winding forest trails.

meanings.definition: The act of writing on the outside of a letter or package.
meanings.sent1: Please ensure the superscription is clear and legible for the postal service.
meanings.sent2: The superscription on the envelope indicated it was from my pen pal.
meanings.sent3: His messy superscription made it difficult to determine the sender of the package.
meanings.sent4: The superscription on the parcel seemed to whisper secrets of its journey.
meanings.sent5: The superscription on the letter was elegantly penned in flowing script.
